This is just RSA-129

Google the modulus to find out its factors:

http://www.mit.edu/people/warlord/RSA129-announce.txt

GP/PARI> n
%31 = 114381625757888867669235779976146612010218296721242362562561842935706935245733897830597123563958705058989075147599290026879543541
GP/PARI> p
%25 = 3490529510847650949147849619903898133417764638493387843990820577
GP/PARI> q
%26 = 32769132993266709549961988190834461413177642967992942539798288533
GP/PARI> e
%27 = 9007
GP/PARI> d
%28 = 106698614368578024442868771328920154780709906633937862801226224496631063125911774470873340168597462306553968544513277109053606095
GP/PARI> c
%29 = 79967232217655041514071341874935420345251471140373943273058758545171089326312697651504633125263882740946173874151357537722443445
GP/PARI> m = lift(modexp(c, d, n))
%24 = 80103110020080500161201140520

"Using the decoding scheme 01=A, 02=B, ..., 26=Z, and 00 a space between
words, the decoded message reads"

080103110020080500161201140520
H A C K   T H E   P L A N E T


Flag should be:

/hack\s?the\s?planet/i
